description:
Here's what you can expect to learn in this action packed course:

This course is for the employee that has an idea, product or service and would like to start a business on the side and make EXTRA money each month but doesn’t know how to start an internet business. This course is also ideal for someone that needs help transitioning and creating a strategy to exit the workplace.

The course on how to start an internet business is taught by Abdul Mohammed and Montina Portis.  Abdul is the CEO of Diversify Yourself, LLC, a Financial and Small Business Coach and owner of Hot Dog Carts.  He runs his businesses full-time.  Learn more about Abdul at http://startabusinessforcheap.com

Montina is an I.T. Security Analyst and works full-time.  She founded Organic Life Products and has made over $50k in sales since 2011.  She leads by example and teaches part-time entrepreneurs how to start an internet business and achieve full-time success and make their first $1k online.  Learn more about Montina at http://fulltimesuccess.com

If you have ever thought about starting a business and simply didn't know how to start an internet business, this course will help guide you.  There is a part-time entrepreneur checklist and exercises to help you identify your "WHY," discover if you should create or sell a product and find out what you MUST do while building your business.
title: The Beginnersâ€™ Guide: How to Launch a Business While Working
instructors: Montina Young Portis, Abdul S. Mohammed
